price: (32) So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest.[1048]
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
